name: MemberPress HubSpot
author: Nathan Smith

sections.description: Allows users to be entered into a HubSpot workflow upon subscription to a membership in MemberPress.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/mp-hubspot directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->MemberPress HubSpot Settings screen to configure the API key
  4. To configure the workflows, go to MemberPress->Memberships. Select your membership then go to Membership Options->Advanced and look for “Enroll in HubSpot workflow” to select the desired workflow.
sections.faq:
None

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/mp-hubspot directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->MemberPress HubSpot Settings screen to configure the API key
  4. To configure the workflows, go to MemberPress->Memberships. Select your membership then go to Membership Options->Advanced and look for “Enroll in HubSpot workflow” to select the desired workflow.

short_description: Allows users to be entered into a HubSpot workflow upon subscription to a membership in MemberPress.
description: Allows users to be entered into a HubSpot workflow upon subscription to a membership in MemberPress.

screenshots.caption: Configuring the workflow for the MemberPress subscription.
